item1: (two months). Irish whiskey must matured least three years wood cask, such oak, island Ireland. Scotch whisky must matured oak casks least three years Scotland. comply all applicable laws regulations.
item2: present changes certain measures, line items, statements operations adjusted “organic” basis. use “organic change” following measures: (a) organic net sales; (b) organic cost sales; (c) organic gross profit; (d) organic advertising expenses; (e) organic selling, general, administrative (SG&A) expenses; (f) organic other expense (income), net; (g) organic operating expenses ; (h) organic operating income. calculate these measures, adjust, applicable, (1) acquisitions divestitures, (2) other items, (3) foreign exchange. explain these adjustments below.
